thoughts: Is surprised to find {PRONOUN/m_c/self} walking the stars of Silverpelt
Is begging StarClan to send {PRONOUN/m_c/object} back
Wants to comfort a Clanmate who is grieving over {PRONOUN/m_c/object}
Is overwhelmed after meeting so many starry cats
Clings to the warmth of {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} litter
Doesn't want to leave {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} litter behind
